title: Mr. Panda Pro
author: Mr. Panda Pro
content: What could be the state of Bitcoin in the future?This is discussed all the time but I am asking this question because my elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymore and will be completely dead. He also said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not be mined so that Bitcoin will not be able to hold its own position.So I would like to know from you how reasonable this statement is?

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: It's either your brother doesn't know about bitcoin or he is a perma bear on hater or dislike it, or maybe trolling you.Bitcoin has been with us in the last ten years or so and will continue to exist for many years. It's that the market is really uncertain for now as we are in a bear market wherein the price is going down. But eventually there come a time that we will recover. And we are looking at around 2024-2025. So instead that bitcoin being dead around 2025, it will be a time that we might see the price going into the $100,000 or even more price.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: The state of bitcoin in the future is that it would continue to live on as long as the digital era exists. Bitcoin has gone a long way for someone to assume or think that it will come to an end so soon without a proper logical explanation. Bitcoin is above ten years of existence in case your brother doesn't know. Disregard your brother's words, he's just exaggerating without a reasonable fact.Since you do know that the bitcoin future has been discussed here severally why then would you allow your brother's words to bother you about the future fate of bitcoin by 2025. That means all the positive posts and replies you have been reading from the forum members about bitcoin's existence are not convincing to you at all to believe that bitcoin would keep existing than expected.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMWhat could be the state of Bitcoin in the future?Satoshi said something like: it's going to be either really big or really small.Quotemy elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymoreYour brother is wrong. Show him this post in 2026.QuoteHe also said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not be minedThere's no reason for all the miners on the planet to stop mining, without anyone else taking their (profitable) place.

comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMThis is discussed all the time but I am asking this question because my elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymore and will be completely dead.What your brother needs to do is put his money where his mouth is and bet short against bitcoin. comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMWhat could be the state of Bitcoin in the future?This is discussed all the time but I am asking this question because my elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymore and will be completely dead. He also said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not be mined so that Bitcoin will not be able to hold its own position.So I would like to know from you how reasonable this statement is?Technically, the last bitcoin that is going to be mined is around 2140, so we won't see that even in our lifetime.If you want to find out how many times bitcoin supposedly die, you can check it out here: https://99bitcoins.com/bitcoin-obituaries/In 2024, we will have a bitcoin halving event, you can research about it, but I will tell you that it's one catalyst to bring the market into another bull run, so if that happens then bitcoin is not going to die on 2025.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMSo I would like to know from you how reasonable this statement is?It's completely unreasonable. It is a mix of misunderstanding and wrong information.Bitcoin block rewards will become 0 only in about 2140. And even then, mining should not stop since the miners also receive the transaction fees (they receive those now too!)So the year is wrong, the mining/block reward is misunderstood, hence 2025 is just a random date. And it's so close, the chances Bitcoin die off this fast are small.

comments.author: Rufsilf
comments.body: It is full of uncertainties and doubts especially if we are negative people as we already think it dies. Those who come and understand the situation will likely not talk about what will happen in the future but rather hear from them saying "this investment will grow and was beneficial to the community". They are very certain because they trusted Bitcoin. Just wait for that time OP before making assumptions as it can be just wrong...

comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMmy elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymore and will be completely dead.if you look at the media over the past 13 years you can see that people have been repeating this same FUD from early years. they just change the death year. at some point they said when reward halves from 50 to 25 it will die but bitcoin is still alive and getting stronger even though reward is 6.25!!!

comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinHodler on July 20, 2022, 02:12:47 PMQuote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMmy elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymore and will be completely dead.if you look at the media over the past 13 years you can see that people have been repeating this same FUD from early years. they just change the death year. at some point they said when reward halves from 50 to 25 it will die but bitcoin is still alive and getting stronger even though reward is 6.25!!!The future of bitcoin is not easy to predict, but looking at the conditions and progress of the future, of course crypto, especially bitcoin will get a place as one of the global currencies, crypto or bitcoin so far is a form of technological development in terms of finance and I think in the future crypto will continue to grow rapidly, I do not agree with the view that bitcoin will die in the future because I think the modern world community will not be able to resist a technological advance.

comments.author: minairia3
comments.body: Your brother probably doesn't know anything about bitcoin. If saying bitcoin is dying this is more accurate time, bear market is happening and bitcoin is correcting very low against ATH and many people are saying bitcoin is dying and will go to zero soon. Ee are waiting for 2025, at which time our target for bitcoin will be $100k and your brother should say bitcoin bubble will burst in 2025, instead of saying it will die by 2025.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: This only proves that your brother is really foolish and giving free advice without any knowledge.Just ask your brother to surf the internet and search about Bitcoin’s marketcap. That is enough to prove what Bitcoins are capable of.These are the persons who pass negative comments when the price falls down. And when the price again starts to gain, they will be the ones who will change the mood and be a completely Bitcoin Follower.In short the OP’s brother is really sick and needs to stop predicting like astronomous.

comments.author: superman184
comments.body: we never know what will happen in the future, technology is developing very rapidly, bitcoin is one example of the result of a technology that is very important for now. many of the results of a technology that develops in the end cannot survive because along with the changing times, the technology itself is abandoned.maybe if this world is no longer energyless maybe bitcoin will disappear but I think it's very unlikely that will happen.

comments.body: From what i understand for cryptocurrency the state of cryptocurrency in the future is not something that we can predict to know the value actually. The values of cryptocurrency is something we can not predict correct to know the next values of cryptocurrency in the next five years. With the current values of cryptocurrency now. But the state whereby people is coming in into cryptocurrency market and industrial firms is what will state the  future of cryptocurrency as i can see.

comments.author: barbara44
comments.body: I don't know if what event btc will have on 2025 but I know that there was a halving on 2024. The price can surely dumped after that but that is not enough for bitcoin to die. Also it was not 2025 when the mining will stop or the whole bitcoins will be mined but according to google it's on 2140, when all the 21 million supply have all been mined out but after that I think, bitcoin can still hold on to its position. It will still be the number one crypto. The state of bitcoin in the future is still unknown though because none of us here have the ability to see the future or to travel on it, not even your elder brother so don't believe on what he was saying.

comments.author: Captain Corporate
comments.body: I think it was "always" uncertain but at the same time its getting a bit better in the long run. This is of course not something bad because we do not need to understand if it is doing badly or doing greatly before we invest, because we just need to trust it. I believe that in the long run we are going to see it go up, and thats enough and there isn't anything good that could come up from thinking bitcoin will do something horrible, it will be decent. Hence, I believe that we should be just trusting it because thats literally all the possible outcome that would help us, why wouldn't we trust it in that case? What good would saying "its going to be bad" for any of us?

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Panda Pro on July 20, 2022, 06:00:41 AMWhat could be the state of Bitcoin in the future?This is discussed all the time but I am asking this question because my elder brother said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not exist anymore and will be completely dead. He also said that after 2025 Bitcoin will not be mined so that Bitcoin will not be able to hold its own position.So I would like to know from you how reasonable this statement is? Is he a fiat enthusiast? Because those who always say that are totally in opposition to bitcoin. But as a friendly advice, have your own research so you will know more about bitcoin. Bitcoin has always its uncertain future just like us because we even don't know what holds in the future. But one thing is certain, bitcoin will not die easily especially that bitcoin is already backed by big institutions and big countries. Although it has its own flaws that are always inevitable, but as long as the demand from the community is still there, bitcoin recovers and skyrocket again.
